TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
Woop!, count me in for the second green light group!

I'm coming for you Red Iron Crown....

I'm coming for you Red Iron Crown....

You should probably stop repping me then.
I think Upsilon is waiting for me to get my second bar before he updates.

I think Upsilon is waiting for me to get my second bar before he updates.

There will probably be several events that randomly correspond with my update. Possibly the most notable (for me at least) is that I'm currently a single point of Reputation away from moving into the #2 slot on the Light-Green Group. It's a bit absurd (I haven't been as active on the Forum as usual lately) but I'm not complaining!

I will, however, not exceed RIC in reputation. Ever. If I even get close to disturbing this hallowed balance, I'll just +Rep Red Iron Crown as often as I possibly can until he's safely above me. There are three certainties in life: death, taxes, and RIC being at the very top of the Light-Green Group. I don't want to mess any of them... some problem with fundamental quantum physics may occur

-Upsilon
Aaargh, you bum. I thought it got updated.

I will, however, not exceed RIC in reputation. Ever. If I even get close to disturbing this hallowed balance, I'll just +Rep Red Iron Crown as often as I possibly can until he's safely above me. There are three certainties in life: death, taxes, and RIC being at the very top of the Light-Green Group. I don't want to mess any of them... some problem with fundamental quantum physics may occur

I'd rather fall out of the top spot than have people repping me just to keep me there artificially. I wasn't always the member with the most rep, and I expect I won't always be, either. Whoever eventually passes me will get my sincerest congratulations.

I can't resist pointing out that you got where you are in less than 1/7th as many posts as me.

If you wait some unknown time to update, I'm only 12 points away. Who knows how long that will be

Edit: It will apparently be two days! Hello light green!

Edited May 20, 2015 by magico13

I am just 9 rep points from moving up 1 spot on the first page here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?&pp=30&order=desc&sort=reputation

31st overall though...just wow. Never been so active in another game/hobby community.

Edited May 21, 2015 by r4pt0r
I'm at 1038 so if I manage to reach 1099, I'll jump from 2 to 4 light green bars on the list. Oh deer.

O_O

I have a reputation that rivals Jebediah's.

I'd like to thank everything for all the internet points! Seriously, thank you, I never expected to get this much.

Hello, green light group!

EDIT:

Also, almost 1,000 posts.
Congrats, dude! Well earned.

whoa.

i iz on first page.

I iz on first page.

wow

five lg bars

thank you community. u is da best.
Just another 8 months until I get here Im coming Mad Rocket Scientist Eventually.
I just realised that on the first page of users by rep, only me, OWK, and Roverdude have joined less than two years ago. Is that an achievement?

I just realised that on the first page of users by rep, only me, OWK, and Roverdude have joined less than two years ago. Is that an achievement?

Look at Zucal that guy is amazing. Super fast at getting rep. And if Zucal is reading this, you got some great replicas.

I see everything

and thanks
Four bars and counting! I'll be there before long...
Actually, if you disregard Squad, Jeb, and the rest of that gang for their artificially inflated rep, im in 24th overall, incredible.

*Virtual Bump

Upsilon, are you going to update this? Many new forum-ers have recently gotten there - notably Zucal and Mad Rocket Scientist. Will you still put their names up?

Edited May 28, 2015 by Columbia

*Virtual Boost-up Upsilon, are you going to update this? Many new forum-ers have recently gotten there - notably Zucal and Mad Rocmet Scientist. Will you still put their names up?

of course he will, he said a ~week ago he intends to get to it, but as I recall his internet is spotty or something like that? so time to dedicate to updating the OP might be sparse.
2 Light Green Bars!
Congrats Robotengineer!
The comment for Vexx scares me...
I'm only 9 points away from joining!
